description: Add found languages to language import
replace:
<xf:if is="$files is not empty">
	<xf:hiddenval name="product_id" value="{$product.product_id}" />
	<xf:hiddenval name="profile_id" value="{$product.profile_id}" />
	
	<xf:hiddenval name="file_type" value="local" />
	<xf:selectrow name="file" label="{{ phrase('th_iau_file') }}">
		<xf:foreach loop="$files" value="$file">
			<xf:option value="{$file.path}">{$file.name}.xml</xf:option>
		</xf:foreach>
	</xf:selectrow>
	<xf:else />
	<xf:radiorow name="file_type" label="{{ phrase('th_iau_file') }}">
		<xf:option value="url"
				   checked="{{ true }}"
				   label="{{ phrase('th_iau_import_from_url') }}">
			<xf:dependent>
				<xf:textbox name="url" />
			</xf:dependent>
		</xf:option>
		<xf:option value="upload_zip"
				   label="{{ phrase('th_iau_import_from_uploaded_zip_file') }}">
			<xf:dependent>
				<xf:upload name="upload_zip" accept=".zip"/>
			</xf:dependent>
		</xf:option>
		<xf:option value="upload"
				   label="{{ phrase('import_from_uploaded_xml_file') }}">
			<xf:dependent>
				<xf:upload name="upload" accept=".xml"/>
			</xf:dependent>
		</xf:option>
	</xf:radiorow>
</xf:if>
